biotools.summary: PhyloPrimer is a taxon-specific oligonucleotide design platform. PhyloPrimer was born from a collaboration between the University of Bristol and ENOVEO, a company involved in bioremediation and microbial monitoring projects that looks into a wide variety of environmental samples with the aim of identifying specific genes and microorganisms.
